text: Keith Birdsong (July 14, 1959 â€“ June 4, 2019) was a Muscogee Creek-Cherokee illustrator.Carr, Richard. "Special Sheet Features American Indian Dances." Sun Sentinel. 30 June 1996. Retrieved 16 Jan 2011. He was born in Muskogee, Oklahoma. Birdsong was best known for illustrating covers of Star Trek novels. Birdsong was killed in a car crash on June 4, 2019 at the age of 59. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:American illustrators Category:People from Muskogee, Oklahoma
title: Keith Birdsong
